channel.title: Fqns on Metricly Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Fqns on Metricly Docs

item.title: Optional Config
item.description: Changing Element Display Names You can change the display name of certain elements to help distinguish between each instance. Navigate to Integrations > Linux Integration. Click Advanced; a menu expands. Click the Element Name field to edit it. Type the desired name into the field. An element name of ${meta.originalName} would resolve to whatever name comes in with the original element payload before it would be replaced with the optional element name template.
